Title: Kick-Ass
Overview: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a super-hero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.
Keywords: crime fighter, secret identity, comic book, superhero, murder, comedy, mafia, teenager, violence, realism, rookie, adaptation, young adult, kickass
Cast: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Chloë Grace Moretz, Christopher Mintz-Plasse
